item.name: Redshift::CPUUtilization
item.description: The percentage of CPU utilization. For clusters, this metric represents an aggregation of all nodes (leader and compute) CPU utilization values.

item.name: Redshift::DatabaseConnections
item.description: The number of database connections to a cluster.

item.name: Redshift::HealthStatus
item.description: Indicates the health of the cluster. 1/0 (HEALTHY/UNHEALTHY in the Amazon Redshift console)

item.name: Redshift::MaintenanceMode
item.description: Indicates whether the cluster is in maintenance mode. 1/0 (ON/OFF in the Amazon Redshift console)

item.name: Redshift::NetworkReceiveThroughput
item.description: The rate at which the node or cluster receives data.

item.name: Redshift::NetworkTransmitThroughput
item.description: The rate at which the node or cluster writes data.

item.name: Redshift::PercentageDiskSpaceUsed
item.description: The percent of disk space used.

item.name: Redshift::ReadIOPS
item.description: The average number of disk read operations per second.

item.name: Redshift::ReadLatency
item.description: The average amount of time taken for disk read I/O operations.

item.name: Redshift::ReadThroughput
item.description: The average number of bytes read from disk per second.

item.name: Redshift::WriteIOPS
item.description: The average number of write operations per second.

item.name: Redshift::WriteLatency
item.description: The average amount of time taken for disk write I/O operations.

item.name: Redshift::WriteThroughput
item.description: The average number of bytes written to disk per second.

trigger.name: Redshift::Cluster is in Maintenance Mode (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Indicates whether the cluster is in maintenance mode. 1/0 (ON/OFF in the Amazon Redshift console)

trigger.name: Redshift::Cluster is unhealthy (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Indicates the health of the cluster. 1/0 (HEALTHY/UNHEALTHY in the Amazon Redshift console)

trigger.name: Redshift::Read Latency is High (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The average amount of time taken for disk read I/O operations.

trigger.name: Redshift::Read Latency is High (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The average amount of time taken for disk read I/O operations.

trigger.name: Redshift::Write Latency is High (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The average amount of time taken for disk write I/O operations.

trigger.name: Redshift::Write Latency is High (LV={ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The average amount of time taken for disk write I/O operations.
